front.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for the Interface of New Gas-Insulated Equipment in Existing Gas-Insulated Substations Rated above 52 kV

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Recommendations for the connection of gas-insulated substation to another gas-insulated substation of a different make or design are given. IEEE Std 1416TM is replaced by this recommended practice.
